short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See how Facebook's latest AI is doing by viewing the auto-generated alt-text captions. The extension isn't affiliated with Facebook.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Facebook uses machine learning technology to automatically generates "secret captions" for every photo you upload, but normally you aren't able to see them. With this extension, these hidden captions become visible! How good is Facebook's latest tech at correctly describing what's in your photos? You be the judge!

This extension is not affiliated with Facebook.
